sentences.en: Adipose tissue cells are mixed the parathyroid tissue.
sentences.cn: 脂肪细胞与甲状旁腺组织混在一起.

sentences.en: Conclusion Ultrasonographic examination is useful for diagnosing parathyroid carcinoma.
sentences.cn: 结论超声对甲状旁腺癌的诊断有一定的临床应用价值.

sentences.en: Here is a normal parathyroid gland for comparison.
sentences.cn: 作为对比,图示正常甲状旁腺.

sentences.en: Here is a parathyroid adenoma , which is the most common cause for primary hyperparathyroidism.
sentences.cn: 甲状旁腺腺瘤是引起原发性甲状旁腺功能亢进最常见的原因.

sentences.en: Hypomagnesemia interferes with the effects of parathyroid hormone, resulting in hypocalcemia.
sentences.cn: 低镁会影响甲状旁腺激素的作用, 导致低钙,也可低钾.

sentences.en: It was two months after my kidney stones were discovered that doctors finally diagnosed the growth on my parathyroid gland. And in those months, my state deteriorated further.
sentences.cn: 在我肾结石被发现两个月后，医生最终将病情诊断为甲状旁腺亢进。而我的身体状况也在这两个月里变得更加糟糕。

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the ultrasonographic features of parathyroid carcinoma.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨甲状旁腺癌的声像图表现.

sentences.en: Objective To study the clinical feature, treatment and prognosis of parathyroid carcinoma.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨甲状旁腺癌的临床特征 、 治疗方法及预后.

sentences.en: Other drugs proven effective for osteoporosis are hormones and parathyroid hormone.
sentences.cn: 其它对治疗骨质疏松症有效的药物还有激素和甲状旁腺素.

sentences.en: Parathyroid carcinomas infiltrate surrounding structures in the neck.
sentences.cn: 甲状旁腺癌浸润周围的颈部组织.

sentences.en: Parathyroid hormone is a well - known regulator of calcium metabolism in the body.
sentences.cn: 甲状旁腺素是一种广为人知的激素,它主要调节人体内钙的代谢.

sentences.en: Parathyroid hormone, as a systemic mediator of calcium and bone metabolism, is a good candidate.
sentences.cn: 因此,甲状旁腺素作为一种全身钙和骨质代谢的调节物, 理应成为值得关注的研究对象.

sentences.en: Parathyroid Hormone: Is There a Role in Fracture Healing?
sentences.cn: 甲状旁腺素: 在骨折愈合中是否发生作用?

sentences.en: Skeletal remodeling is controlled by the actions of many different hormones, including vitamin D and parathyroid hormone (PTH).
sentences.cn: 骨重建是由很多不同激素它们的功能所控制的，其中包括维生素D和甲状旁腺素。

sentences.en: Supports the proper function of the thyroid and parathyroid glands.
sentences.cn: 调理甲状腺及副甲状腺.

sentences.en: The culprits in all this are the parathyroid glands.
sentences.cn: 这一切的罪魁祸首就是甲状旁腺。

sentences.en: This is the gross appearance of a parathyroid carcinoma.
sentences.cn: 甲状旁腺癌的大体外观.

sentences.en: Ultrasonography was helpful in diagnosis of parathyroid adenoma, hyperplasia or carcinoma when combined with clinical manifestations.
sentences.cn: 单从声像图上难以区分甲状旁腺腺瘤 、 增生或癌,需结合临床考虑.
